## Summary
- What changed and why?

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature

- [ ] Key API route(s) tested

- [ ] No secrets added to repo
- [ ] Auth/permissions impact reviewed

- [ ] Environment variable changes documented
- [ ] Rollback plan noted (if risky)
